channel.title: Got an error I can't figure out
channel.description:
Okay, I made mage so you have to have runes.. Then when I compiled, got this..
[code]client.java:4286: ')' expected if((playerHasItemAmount(563, 2==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 8)==true))
^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I tried adding another ')' but it just gave me 2 errors...

IT WORKED! TY SHIFT!
